title: Screen froze right as champ select opened
body: As soon as champ select started (in nemesis draft) , the screen froze but my internet was perfectly fine, not a wifi problem. I had to restart it but now i have a 12 minute wait :( what could have caused it?

replies.body: Did just your client freeze or was it your whole computer? The difference can point to different causes of the issue.
Sorry I forgot to specify, I meant the client. Also this has happened twice now.

Thanks for clarifying that. When the client freezes, it's often a result of the client's connection to the server dropping off enough to completely disconnect it. The most common causes for this are local network settings that conflict with League. Our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a great place to start in finding a solution for this.

Let me know if that guide changed anything.
I turned off firewall and it seems to have stopped. Thank you very much !!
